title: PM Modi on The Kashmir Files: Entire ecosystem worked to hide truth, now rattled by a film - The Indian Express
content:
1. PM Modi on The Kashmir Files: Entire ecosystem worked to hide truth, now rattled by a film  The Indian Express
  2. OPINION | Can Kashmir Files change the way Bollywood works?  India Today
  3. PM Says "Conspiracy", "Campaign To Discredit" Film 'The Kashmir Files'  NDTV
  4. Meet Asiya Andrabi – a Pakistani agent who sought to free Kashmir from Hindus  OpIndia
  5. Anupam Kher, Vivek Agnihotri break down during discussion on The Kashmir Files  India Today
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Referring to the uproar over 'Kashmir Files', the Prime Minister said while addressing the BJP’s Members of Parliament in the parliamentary party meeting that the reluctance over presenting history and historical figures in the right perspective has led to the delayed recognition of Mahatma Gandhi as well.
